00028 #ifndef _QICSSELECTION_H
00029 #define _QICSSELECTION_H
00030 
00031 #include <qvaluevector.h>
00032 
00033 #ifndef QICS_MIN
00034 # define QICS_MIN(a,b) ((a) < (b) ? (a) : (b))
00035 #endif
00036 #ifndef QICS_MAX
00037 # define QICS_MAX(a,b) ((a) > (b) ? (a) : (b))
00038 #endif
00039 
00047 // Represents a simple, rectangular selection
00048 
00068 class QicsSelection
00069 {
00070 public:
00074     QicsSelection();
00075 
00082     QicsSelection(int anchor_row, int anchor_col,
00083           int end_row, int end_col, bool select_state = true);
00084 
00085     QicsSelection(const QicsSelection &sel);
00086 
00091     inline void setSelected(bool set)
00092     { mySelectState = set; }
00093 
00098     inline bool selected(void) const
00099     { return mySelectState; }
00100 
00104     bool isValid(void) const;
00105 
00109     void setAnchorRow(int anchor_row);
00113     void setAnchorColumn(int anchor_col);
00117     void setAnchorCell(int anchor_row, int anchor_col);
00118 
00122     void setEndRow(int end_row);
00126     void setEndColumn(int end_col);
00130     void setEndCell(int end_row, int end_col);
00131 
00135     inline int anchorRow(void) const { return myAnchorRow; }
00139     inline int anchorColumn(void) const { return myAnchorCol; }
00140 
00144     inline int endRow(void) const { return myEndRow; }
00148     inline int endColumn(void) const { return myEndCol; }
00149 
00153     inline int topRow(void) const { return QICS_MIN(myAnchorRow, myEndRow); }
00157     inline int leftColumn(void) const { return QICS_MIN(myAnchorCol, myEndCol); }
00158 
00162     inline int bottomRow(void) const { return QICS_MAX(myAnchorRow, myEndRow); }
00166     inline int rightColumn(void) const { return QICS_MAX(myAnchorCol, myEndCol); }
00167 
00171     inline int numColumns(void) const { return (rightColumn() - leftColumn() + 1); }
00172 
00176     inline int numRows(void) const { return (bottomRow() - topRow() + 1); }
00177 
00181     void setEntireRow(int row);
00182 
00186     void setEntireColumn(int col);
00187 
00193     bool intersects(const QicsSelection &sel);
00194 
00198     QicsSelection operator&(const QicsSelection &sel);
00199 
00203     QicsSelection intersect(const QicsSelection &sel);
00204 
00211     friend bool operator==(const QicsSelection &r1,
00212                                        const QicsSelection &r2);
00219     friend bool operator!=(const QicsSelection &r1,
00220                        const QicsSelection &r2);
00221 protected:
00223     bool mySelectState;
00224 
00226     int myAnchorRow;
00228     int myAnchorCol;
00230     int myEndRow;
00232     int myEndCol;
00233 private:
00234 
00235 };
00236 
00237 // A complex selection may have more than one area, hence the separate class
00238 
00250 class QicsSelectionList : public QValueVector<QicsSelection>
00251 {
00252 public:
00256     QicsSelectionList();
00257 
00262     bool isCellSelected(int row, int col) const;
00263 
00268     bool isRowSelected(int row) const;
00269 
00274     bool isColumnSelected(int col) const;
00275 };
00276 
00277 #endif /* _QICSSELECTION_H */
